name: voicegpt
description: This is a Nodejs (for API) and Reactjs (for UI) app that helps transcribe audio files to text and equally makes further searches on the text from the audio and gives you a response, with some additional features for swift functionality with the help of OpenAI.

scripts.client:prod: cd frontend && npm install && npm start
scripts.server:prod: cd backend && npm install && npm run dev

author: Stanley Chibuike
